naslov: Idealna luksuzna vila u Makarskoj! Tri stambene jedinice. 400 m2 (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaje se prelijepa moderna vila u Makarskoj. Vila se prostire na 400 m2, ima okućnicu površine 250 m2. Na prizemlju se nalazi dvorište s bazenom i sunčalištem. Prizemlje i prvi kat čine prostran četverosoban stan, sa dnevnim boravkom, kuhinjom s blagovaonicom, i trima kupaonicama, te dva balkona. Na prvom katu je jednosoban stan sa dnevnim boravkom, kuhinjom s blagovaonicom, kupaonicom i balkonom. Na drugom katu je trosoban stan s dvije kupaonice, vešerajem, dnevnim dijelom, kuhinjom s blagovaonicom, i balkonom. Vila ima dva podruma, parking za sedam vozila. Razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani Ugovor o posredovanju, a što je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonom o posredovanju i prometu nekretninama. Kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju. Za sve dodatne informacije, i razgled, ljubazno molimo zvati na +385 99 4000 602 (Katja). Beautiful modern villa for sale in Makarska! The villa covers an area of ​​400 m2 and has a garden area of ​​250 m2. On the ground floor there is a courtyard with a swimming pool and a sunbathing area. The ground floor and the first floor consist of a spacious four-room apartment, with a living room, a kitchen with a dining room, three bathrooms, and two balconies. On the first floor is a one-room apartment with a living room, a kitchen with a dining room, a bathroom and a balcony. On the second floor is a three-room apartment with two bathrooms, a laundry room, a living room, a kitchen with a dining room, and a balcony. The villa has two basements, parking for seven vehicles. Viewing the property is only possible with a signed Brokerage Agreement, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Act on Brokerage and Real Estate Transactions. The buyer pays the agency commission. For all additional information and a tour, please call at +385 99 4000 602 (Katja).
